price: و موسی گفت: «ای فرعون، من فرستاده‌ای از [سوی] پروردگار جهانیانم.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāfir'ʿawnu innī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
